            }
        }
        if(rSel === 0){
            fill(215, 215, 215);
        }
        rect(370, 300, 80, 30);
        fill(230, 230, 230);
        if(mX > 460 && mY > 300 && mX < 540 && mY < 330){
            fill(225, 225, 225);
            if(mouseP){
                rSel = 1;
                br = "Red";
            }
        }
        if(rSel === 1){
            fill(215, 215, 215);
        }
        rect(460, 300, 80, 30);
        fill(230, 230, 230);
        if(mX > 370 && mY > 340 && mX < 450 && mY < 370){
            fill(225, 225, 225);
            if(mouseP){
                rSel = 2;
                br = "Red";
            }
        }
        if(rSel === 2){
            fill(215, 215, 215);
        }
        rect(370, 340, 80, 30);
        fill(230, 230, 230);
        if(mX > 460 && mY > 340 && mX < 540 && mY < 370){
            fill(225, 225, 225);
            if(mouseP){
                rSel = 3;
                br = "Red";
            }
        }
        if(rSel === 3){
            fill(215, 215, 215);
        }
        rect(460, 340, 80, 30);
        fill(0, 0, 0);
        text(cards[rDeck[rOrder[0]]][0], 410, 315);
        text(cards[rDeck[rOrder[1]]][0], 500, 315);
        text(cards[rDeck[rOrder[2]]][0], 410, 355);
        text(cards[rDeck[rOrder[3]]][0], 500, 355);
        textAlign(LEFT, BASELINE);
        text("Next: "+cards[rDeck[rOrder[4]]][0], 370, 383);
        if(mode === 2){
            fill(230, 230, 230);
            ellipse(355, 315, 10, 10);
            ellipse(355, 355, 10, 10);
            ellipse(555, 315, 10, 10);
            ellipse(555, 355, 10, 10);
            textAlign(CENTER, CENTER);
            fill(0, 0, 0);
            text("5", 355, 315);
            text("7", 355, 355);
            text("6", 555, 315);
            text("8", 555, 355);
        }
        textAlign(LEFT, BASELINE);
    }
    else{
        br = "Blue";
    }
    
    
    //What tile am I over?
    var tileHover = getTileOver();
    
    //Get tile and spawn cards
    if(tileHover !== null){
        var tileData = getTileInfo(tileHover[0], tileHover[1]);
        var placeable = false;
        if(tileData !== "river" && tileData !== "banned" && tileData !== "princess" && tileData !== "crown"){
            placeable = true;
        }
        noStroke();
        if(br === "Blue" && bSel !== -1){
            var spell = false;
            var recruit = false;
            var cardIndex = bDeck[bOrder[bSel]];
            if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                cardIndex = lastCardB;
            }
            if(cards[cardIndex].length > 4){
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "spell"){
                    spell = true;
                }
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "recruits"){
                    recruit = true;
                }
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "defspell"){
                    if(tileData !== "river" && tileData !== "banned"){
                        placeable = true;
                    }
                }
            }
            if(tileData === "river" && !spell){
                placeable = true;
                if(tileHover[0] >= 16){
                    tileHover[0] = 17;
                }
                else{
                    tileHover[0] = 14;
                }
            }
            if(tileHover[1] < 9 && tileData === "princess" && bTroops[1] === "null"){
                placeable = true;
            }
            if(tileHover[1] > 8 && tileData === "princess" && bTroops[2] === "null"){
                placeable = true;
            }
            if(tileHover[0] === 10 && !spell && ((rTroops[1] === "null" && tileHover[1] < 10) || (rTroops[2] === "null" && tileHover[1] > 7))){
                tileHover[0] = 11;
            }
            if(tileHover[0] < 11){
                placeable = false;
            }
            if(spell){
                if(tileData !== "banned"){
                    placeable = true;
                }
            }
            else if(recruit){
                if(tileHover[1] < 6 || tileHover[1] > 11){
                    placeable = false;
                }
                if(((tileHover[0] > 23 && bTroops[1] === "null" && bTroops[2] === "null") || tileHover[0] > 26) && tileHover[0] < 31){
                    placeable = false;
                }
                fill(255, 0, 0, 10);
                rect(60, 60, 270, 165);
                if(!(rTroops[1] === "null" && rTroops[2] === "null")){
                    rect(60, 225, 270, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] < 17){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
                if(tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[0] > 14){
                    placeable = false;
                }
            }
            else{
                fill(255, 0, 0, 10);
                rect(60, 60, 270, 165);
                if(rTroops[1] === "null" && rTroops[2] !== "null" && tileHover[0] > 10 && tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[1] === 9){
                    tileHover[1] = 8;
                }
                else if(rTroops[1] !== "null" && rTroops[2] === "null" && tileHover[0] > 10 && tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[1] === 8){
                    tileHover[1] = 9;
                }
                if(rTroops[1] !== "null"){
                    rect(60, 225, 135, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] === 16 && tileHover[1] < 9){
                        tileHover[0] = 17;
                    }
                    if(tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[1] < 9){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
                if(rTroops[2] !== "null"){
                    rect(195, 225, 135, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] === 16 && tileHover[1] > 8){
                        tileHover[0] = 17;
                    }
                    if(tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[1] > 8){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if(br === "Red" && rSel !== -1){
            var spell = false;
            var recruit = false;
            var cardIndex = rDeck[rOrder[rSel]];
            if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                cardIndex = lastCardR;
            }
            if(cards[cardIndex].length > 4){
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "spell"){
                    spell = true;
                }
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "recruits"){
                    recruit = true;
                }
                if(cards[cardIndex][4] === "defspell"){
                    if(tileData !== "river" && tileData !== "banned"){
                        placeable = true;
                    }
                }
            }
            if(tileData === "river" && !spell){
                placeable = true;
                if(tileHover[0] >= 16){
                    tileHover[0] = 17;
                }
                else{
                    tileHover[0] = 14;
                }
            }
            if(tileHover[1] < 9 && tileData === "princess" && rTroops[1] === "null"){
                placeable = true;
            }
            if(tileHover[1] > 8 && tileData === "princess" && rTroops[2] === "null"){
                placeable = true;
            }
            if(tileHover[0] === 21 && !spell && ((bTroops[1] === "null" && tileHover[1] < 10)|| (bTroops[2] === "null" && tileHover[1] > 7))){
                tileHover[0] = 20;
            }
            if(tileHover[0] > 20){
                placeable = false;
            }
            if(spell){
                if(tileData !== "banned"){
                    placeable = true;
                }
            }
            else if(recruit){
                if(tileHover[1] < 6 || tileHover[1] > 11){
                    placeable = false;
                }
                if(((tileHover[0] < 8 && rTroops[1] === "null" && rTroops[2] === "null") || tileHover[0] < 5) && tileHover[0] > 0){
                    placeable = false;
                }
                fill(0, 0, 255, 10);
                rect(60, 375, 270, 165);
                if(!(bTroops[1] === "null" && bTroops[2] === "null")){
                    rect(60, 285, 270, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] > 14){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
                if(tileHover[0] < 17 && tileHover[0] > 14){
                    placeable = false;
                }
            }
            else{
                fill(0, 0, 255, 10);
                rect(60, 375, 270, 165);
                if(bTroops[1] === "null" && bTroops[2] !== "null" && tileHover[0] > 14 && tileHover[0] < 21 && tileHover[1] === 9){
                    tileHover[1] = 8;
                }
                else if(bTroops[1] !== "null" && bTroops[2] === "null" && tileHover[0] > 14 && tileHover[0] < 21 && tileHover[1] === 8){
                    tileHover[1] = 9;
                }
                if(bTroops[1] !== "null"){
                    rect(60, 285, 135, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] === 15 && tileHover[1] < 9){
                        tileHover[0] = 14;
                    }
                    if(tileHover[0] > 14 && tileHover[1] < 9){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
                if(bTroops[2] !== "null"){
                    rect(195, 285, 135, 90);
                    if(tileHover[0] === 15 && tileHover[1] > 8){
                        tileHover[0] = 14;
                    }
                    if(tileHover[0] > 14 && tileHover[1] > 8){
                        placeable = false;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        stroke(0, 0, 0, 50);
        if(click){
        if(br === "Blue" && bSel !== -1){
            stroke(0, 0, 0, 100);
            var cardIndex = bDeck[bOrder[bSel]];
            var mirrored = false;
            if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                cardIndex = lastCardB;
                mirrored = true;
            }
            var cdata = cards[cardIndex];
            if(mirrored){
                cdata[2]++;
            }
            if(elixir >= cdata[2] && placeable){
                var troopsP = cdata[3];
                var i = troopsP.length;
                i--;
                while(i > -1){
                    troopsP[i][4] += tileHover[0];
                    troopsP[i][5] += tileHover[1];
                    troopsP[i][16] = 180;
                    if(mirrored && version !== "retro"){
                        if(troopsP[i][24] === undefined){
                            troopsP[i][24] = [["mirror", false]];
                        }
                        else{
                            troopsP[i][24].push(["mirror", false]);
                        }
                    }
                    bTroops.push(troopsP[i]);
                    i--;
                }
                elixir -= cdata[2];
                say("B placed "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]+" @"+tileHover[0]+","+tileHover[1]);
                bOrder.push(bOrder[bSel]);
                //println(bSel+" "+bOrder[bSel]);
                //say(bSel+" "+bOrder[bSel]);
                bOrder.splice(bSel, 1, bOrder[4]);
                bOrder.splice(4, 1);
                bSel = -1;
                lastCardB = cardIndex;
            }
            else{
                say("Blue failed to spawn "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]);
                if(placeable){
                    say("Not enough elixir!");
                }
                else{
                    say("You can't play here!");
                }
            }
        }
        if(br === "Red" && rSel !== -1){
            stroke(0, 0, 0, 100);
            var cardIndex = rDeck[rOrder[rSel]];
            var mirrored = false;
            if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                cardIndex = lastCardR;
                mirrored = true;
            }
            var cdata = cards[cardIndex];
            if(mirrored){
                cdata[2]++;
            }
            if(elixirR >= cdata[2] && placeable){
                var troopsP = cdata[3];
                var i = troopsP.length;
                i--;
                while(i > -1){
                    troopsP[i][4] -= 0.5;
                    troopsP[i][5] -= 0.5;
                    troopsP[i][4] *= -1;
                    troopsP[i][5] *= -1;
                    troopsP[i][4] += 0.5;
                    troopsP[i][5] += 0.5;
                    troopsP[i][4] += tileHover[0];
                    troopsP[i][5] += tileHover[1];
                    if(mirrored && version !== "retro"){
                        if(troopsP[i][24] === undefined){
                            troopsP[i][24] = [["mirror", false]];
                        }
                        else{
                            troopsP[i][24].push(["mirror", false]);
                        }
                    }
                    rTroops.push(troopsP[i]);
                    i--;
                }
                elixirR -= cdata[2];
                say("R placed "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]+" @"+tileHover[0]+","+tileHover[1]);
                rOrder.push(rOrder[rSel]);
                //println(bSel+" "+bOrder[bSel]);
                //say(bSel+" "+bOrder[bSel]);
                rOrder.splice(rSel, 1, rOrder[4]);
                rOrder.splice(4, 1);
                rSel = -1;
                lastCardR = cardIndex;
            }
            else{
                say("Red failed to spawn "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]);
                if(placeable){
                    say("Not enough elixir!");
                }
                else{
                    say("You can't play here!");
                }
            }
        }
        }
        strokeWeight(2);
        noFill();
        //Highlights tile
        rect(tileHover[1]*15+60, tileHover[0]*15+60, 15, 15);
    }
    
    //Replay mode
    if(replayMode){
        var i = 0;
        while(i < replay.length){
            if(frame === floor(replay[i][0]*1.5)){
                //Get card name
                replay[i][2] -= 600;
                if(replay[i][2] < 100){
                    replay[i][2] = troops[replay[i][2]];
                }
                else if(replay[i][2] < 200){
                    replay[i][2] = buildings[replay[i][2]-100];
                }
                else if(replay[i][2] < 300){
                    replay[i][2] = spells[replay[i][2]-200];
                }
                say(replay[i][2]);
                //Get card ID
                var j = 0;
                var found = false;
                while(j < cards.length){
                    if(replay[i][2] === cards[j][0]){
                        replay[i][2] = j;
                        found = true;
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if(!found){
                    replay[i][2] = 0;
                }
                if(blueSID === -1){
                    blueSID = replay[i][1];
                }
                if(blueSID === replay[i][1]){
                    var cardIndex = replay[i][2];
                    var mirrored = false;
                    if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                        cardIndex = lastCardB;
                        mirrored = true;
                    }
                    var cdata = cards[cardIndex];
                    if(mirrored){
                        cdata[2]++;
                    }
                    var troopsP = cdata[3];
                    var k = troopsP.length;
                    k--;
                    while(k > -1){
                        troopsP[k][4] += replay[i][4];
                        troopsP[k][5] += replay[i][3];
                        troopsP[k][16] = 180;
                        if(mirrored && version !== "retro"){
                            if(troopsP[k][24] === undefined){
                                troopsP[k][24] = [["mirror", false]];
                            }
                            else{
                                troopsP[k][24].push(["mirror", false]);
                            }
                        }
                        bTroops.push(troopsP[k]);
                        k--;
                    }
                    say("B placed "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]+" @"+replay[i][4]+","+replay[i][3]);
                    lastCardB = cardIndex;
                }
                else{
                    var cardIndex = replay[i][2];
            var mirrored = false;
            if(cards[cardIndex][0] === "Mirror"){
                cardIndex = lastCardR;
                mirrored = true;
            }
            var cdata = cards[cardIndex];
            if(mirrored){
                cdata[2]++;
            }
                var troopsP = cdata[3];
                var k = troopsP.length;
                k--;
                while(k > -1){
                    troopsP[k][4] -= 0.5;
                    troopsP[k][5] -= 0.5;
                    troopsP[k][4] *= -1;
                    troopsP[k][5] *= -1;
                    troopsP[k][4] += 0.5;
                    troopsP[k][5] += 0.5;
                    troopsP[k][4] += replay[i][4];
                    troopsP[k][5] += replay[i][3];
                    if(mirrored && version !== "retro"){
                        if(troopsP[k][24] === undefined){
                            troopsP[k][24] = [["mirror", false]];
                        }
                        else{
                            troopsP[k][24].push(["mirror", false]);
                        }
                    }
                    rTroops.push(troopsP[k]);
                    k--;
                }
                say("R placed "+cdata[0][0]+cdata[0][1]+" @"+replay[i][4]+","+replay[i][3]);
                lastCardR = cardIndex;
                }
            }
            i++;
        }
    }

    //Card changing
    fill(220, 220, 220);
    strokeWeight(1);
    stroke(210, 210, 210);
    rect(400, 560, 220, 30, 10);
    fill(0, 0, 0);
    if(mode === 1){
    var goodSwap = false;
    if(countmatch === 1 && ((br === "Blue" && slot < bDeck.length) || (br === "Red" && slot < rDeck.length))){
        fill(0, 150, 0);
        goodSwap = true;
    }
    if(countmatch === 0){
        fill(150, 0, 0);
    }
    if(countmatch === 1){
        text(cards[cardSelect][0]+" ("+searchCode+")", 405, 575);
    }
    else{
        if(searchCode === ""){
            fill(0, 0, 255);
            text("Search here. Hotkeys: SHIFT/CTRL", 405, 575);
        }
        else{
            text(searchCode, 405, 575);
        }
    }
    fill(0, 0, 0);
    if(countmatch === 1 && ((br === "Blue" && slot < bDeck.length) || (br === "Red" && slot < rDeck.length))){
        fill(0, 150, 0);
    }
    if(((br === "Blue" && slot >= bDeck.length) || (br === "Red" && slot >= rDeck.length))){
        fill(150, 0, 0);
    }
    if(goodSwap){
        if(br === "Blue"){
            text("rep B "+cards[bDeck[bOrder[slot]]][0]+" (S"+slot+")", 405, 585);
        }
        if(br === "Red"){
            text("rep R "+cards[rDeck[rOrder[slot]]][0]+" (S"+slot+")", 405, 585);
        }
    }
    else{
        text("Slot "+(slot), 405, 585);
    }
    }
    else{
        fill(0, 0, 0);
        text("Hotkey mode on!", 405, 575);
        text("Press SHIFT/CTRL to search", 405, 585);
    }
    
    //Search icon
    stroke(0, 0, 0);
    strokeWeight(2);
    line(565, 587, 575, 577);
    fill(255, 255, 255, 100);
    ellipse(580, 572, 10*sqrt(2), 10*sqrt(2));
    
    if(mode === 2){
        stroke(255, 0, 0);
        line(565, 565, 585, 585);
        line(565, 585, 585, 565);
    }
    
    noStroke();
    if(won > 15){
        textAlign(CENTER, CENTER);
        textSize(20);
        if(bTroops[0] === "null"){
            fill(255, 0, 0, (won-15)*255/15);
            rect(105, 260, 180, 80, 4);
            fill(0, 0, 0, (won-30)*255/15);
            text("Red wins!", 195, 285);
        }
        else if(rTroops[0] === "null"){
            fill(0, 0, 255, (won-15)*255/15);
            rect(105, 260, 180, 80, 4);
            fill(0, 0, 0, (won-30)*255/15);
            text("Blue wins!", 195, 285);
        }
        fill(220, 220, 220, (won-45)*255/15);
        if(mX > 160 && mX < 230 && mY > 300 && mY < 330){
            fill(200, 200, 200, (won-45)*255/15);
            if(click){
                bTroops = [
["ctower", 4008, 4008, 90, 29, 9, 2.8, 0, 0, 7, 7, 0, 30, 15, -1, false, 180, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
["ptower", 2534, 2534, 90, 25.5, 3.5, 2, 0, 0, 7.5, 7.5, 0, 24, 30, -1, false, 180, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
["ptower", 2534, 2534, 90, 25.5, 14.5, 2, 0, 0, 7.5, 7.5, 0, 24, 30, -1, false, 180, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
];
                rTroops = [
["ctower", 4008, 4008, 90, 3, 9, 2.8, 0, 0, 7, 7, 0, 30, 15, -1, false, 0, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
["ptower", 2534, 2534, 90, 6.5, 3.5, 2, 0, 0, 7.5, 7.5, 0, 24, 30, -1, false, 0, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
["ptower", 2534, 2534, 90, 6.5, 14.5, 2, 0, 0, 7.5, 7.5, 0, 24, 30, -1, false, 0, 0, "building", "all", 1, 0, 0, []],
];
                elixir = startE;
                elixirR = startE; //Current elixir (Red)
                if(reorder){
                    shuffle(bOrder);
                    shuffle(rOrder);
                }
                bProj = [];
                rProj = [];
                bNProj = [];
                rNProj = [];
                won = 0;
            }
        }
        rect(160, 300, 70, 30);
        textSize(15);
        fill(0, 0, 0, (won-45)*255/15)
        text("Reset", 195, 315);
        textAlign(LEFT, BASELINE);
    }

    //In other news, the changed cursor.
    stroke(0, 0, 0, 100);
    if(mouseP){
        stroke(0, 0, 0, 200);
    }
    noFill();
    ellipse(mX, mY, 10, 10);
    //ellipse(mX, mY, 6, 6);
    ellipse(mX, mY, 1, 1);
    
    //Displays tile information on hover in testing mode.
    noStroke();
    if(testing){
        fill(0, 0, 0, 100);
        if(mouseP){
            fill(0, 0, 0, 200);
        }
        if(tileHover !== null){
            text(tileHover[0]+","+tileHover[1]+","+getTileInfo(tileHover[0], tileHover[1]), mX+5, mY-5);
        }
    }
    click = false;
}
